title: End of journey
initialText: You've reached the end of your journey, young traveler. Do you wish to see what other wonders this world could've offered you? Or do you want to keep on moving and return to your old life?

decisions.result: Very well, traveler. Gently close your eyes, and imagine what could've been...
Very well, traveler. We'll meet again, in another life perhaps. Now, gently close your eyes, and keep dreaming...
